info.name: Node Auth Rest API
info.description: The **nodeAuthRestAPI** Postman collection contains a set of endpoints for implementing authentication and user management functionalities. This collection is designed to facilitate testing, development, and integration of the backend services.

item.name: Authentication
Password Reset

request.description: The **Request Password Reset** **API** allows users to initiate a password reset request by providing their registered email address.

response.name: Successful Response

request.description: The **Get Password Reset Token API** allows users to verify a password reset request using a verification code and obtain a password reset token for further processing.

response.name: Reset Token Expired

request.description: The **Reset Password API** allows users to securely update their account password after successfully verifying the password reset token.

item.description: The **Password Reset** API consists of three endpoints that enable users to reset their passwords securely.

request.description: The **Register** **API** allows secure user creation with validation. Successful registration returns user details.
The **Login** **API** allows users to authenticate and obtain access to protected resources by providing valid credentials.
The **Access Token** **API** allows users to obtain a new access token using a valid refresh token.
The **Logout** **API** allows users to invalidate their session and perform a secure logout by providing a refresh token.

item.description: The **Authentication API Collection** provide endpoints for user registration, login, access token and password reset. These endpoints facilitate secure user authentication and authorization processes within the RESTful API.

item.name: Users

item.description: The **Users API Collection** provides endpoints to manage user-related operations within the application.
